document_data.mainbody:
Delcan was a laborer and a delivery man of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Delcan was a pale-skinned human man with blue eyes and shaved head. He wore simple garb of a wraparound tunic, brown pants, and a hat.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Delcan was employed by Baldurs Mouth and could be found outside the broadsheet publishers office picking up deliveries. The man had a foul attitude thanks to customers incessant requests to purchase the gazette. His temper often boiled over as he preemptively shouted at folk that he did not sell the broadsheets.
